entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 11:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -29.3°C
Wind: SSE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:53 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then blizzard. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:53 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:53 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
